General.Name: Chang Jia M&E Engineering
General.Description: Chang Jia M&E Engineering Corp. engages in the planning, design, and engineering contracting of electrical, drainage, and air-conditioning equipment for various commercial buildings and factories. The company offers project construction management services for water supply, drainage, and sewage system engineering; power plant and steam-electricity symbiosis system engineering services; high and high/low voltage system electrical power transmission and distribution engineering services; and high-rise building complex electromechanical system planning and construction management services. It also provides electronic semiconductor plant and clean room special electromechanical engineering services; system planning, detailed design, and construction supervision and management services; and smoke exhaust system engineering services. In addition, the company is also involved in the sports activities; and import and export businesses. Chang Jia M&E Engineering Corp. was founded in 1982 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
